nodes.text: Jedi pilgrims were a group of Jedi that discovered a vergence on the Outer Rim world of Lothal while passing nearby and constructed a Jedi Temple there, building upon the already-established network of caverns. After construction of the temple was completed, the Jedi realized that the vergence was focused on exploring the nature of a Jedi's attachments to others, and how those attachments may further relate to their service and roles as Jedi.
